title: Spiritual Therapies
cleaned_text: National Library of Medicine's controlled vocabulary thesaurus, [MeSH (Medical Subject Headings)](http://www.nlm.nih.gov/mesh/). Descriptors are arranged in a hierarchical structure, which enables searching at various levels of specificity.
